comment.author: 27866008@N03
comment._content: Both of these planes cannot be CA-3's. Perhaps neither is! This is a CA-5, the preceding photo has different lower wings, for sure, I believe making it a CA-6. I think the CA-3 was open cockpit. Double check everything you read, even this note! A link to info on this aircraft: home.earthlink.net/~ralphcooper/pimagi46.htm

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/27866008@N03] Thanks for the correction!  Upon further review this airplane is the Buhl CA-5 Dole Air Race Plane!
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
